short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to blur page elements for the purpose of screen captures or recordings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to add buttons to any page that, when dragged over contents, either blurs or un-blurs the relevant areas of the page. To show the buttons, double click anywhere. To hide them, double click again.
